message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I can do $10500, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
